rows.label: qst005901_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Nia.
What d'you think of this?

rows.label: qst005901_msg0003
rows.name:
Gula was once a prosperous
republic...

rows.label: qst005901_msg0004
rows.name: Yeah, I've heard about that before.

rows.label: qst005901_msg0005
rows.name:
Old Gula was formed from a
bunch of different clans joining up
and governing together, right?

rows.label: qst005901_msg0006
rows.name:
A proud republic, bringing together
diverse clans under a single banner?

rows.label: qst005901_msg0007
rows.name:
I see, I see... It is all clear to me now!
Surely I was the King of Gula!

rows.label: qst005901_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, I don't know too much about it,
but if you ask the Chief of Torigo,
you might be able to find out more.

rows.label: qst005901_msg0009
rows.name:
Hang on...does a republic even
have a king? It doesn't, right?

rows.label: qst005901_msg0011
rows.name:
We must find this Chief of Torigo
and find out the truth of this tale!
